segments.text: Have you begun cleaning up that room of yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't started yet , but I will .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time are you going to clean it up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm planning on cleaning it up a little later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I told you to clean it up earlier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I am still going to clean it up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Make sure you vacuum and dust your room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't want you to leave until you clean up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My plans aren't until later , so I'll clean it before I go .
segments.speaker: S2
